title: Leading banks by market capitalization in Italy 2019
summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company Name, and Market capitalization in million euros in each Company Name on the y axis.
Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros and Banca Popolare di Sondrio has the lowest Market capitalization in million euros.
The minimum Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio has got 49.94 times less Market capitalization in million euros than the maximum Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Company Name in the x axis and Market capitalization in million euros in the y axis.
The Market capitalization in million euros is highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Company Name, and Market capitalization in million euros in each Company Name on the y axis.
Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo has the highest Market capitalization in million euros and Banca Popolare di Sondrio has the lowest Market capitalization in million euros.
The minimum Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio has got 49.94 times less Market capitalization in million euros than the maximum Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Market capitalization in million euros for 10 number of Company Names.
The Market capitalization in million euros is highest at Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo and lowest at Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio.
The minimum Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio has got 49.94 times less Market capitalization in million euros than the maximum Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo.

Company Name Intesa Sanpaolo is higher than any other Company Names with value 38043.87, followed by UniCredit, and Mediobanca. Down to Company Name Banca Popolare di Sondrio with the lowest value 761.8.
The lowest value 761.8 at Banca Popolare di Sondrio is almost 4.28 times smaller than the average value 8890.39.
Summing up the values of all Company Names, we get total 88903.91.

data.Company Name: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena
